description.p1: We specialize in the prevention, control, adjustment, and settlement of claims. We focus on innovation, investing in advanced technology and highly trained staff to optimize case management with ethics and precision.
description.p2: We are a team that operates under certified and re-certified processes according to ISO 9001:2015, endorsed by Lloyd's of London.

team.title: Team
team.description: The most valuable asset of our organization, made up of over 40 professionals and 25 exclusive collaborators.

location.title: Location
location.address: Los Sauces St. 325, San Isidro, Lima, Peru
